reviewText: I love this series , I bought this box set after seeing clips of this show. On Youtube over and over again, so I looked it up on Amazon and found it for a good price. I was in for a treat when it showed up in the mail. I loved giant robot anime, since I was 4 years old. When I first saw Transformers in 1984 , but since then I've discovered a ton of other giant robot titles. In anime Gaogaigar being one of the best, so good it has a slang term. To describe the over the top levels, of an action  mecha series .The term is called GAR ,anyway you have to get this series. If you are a fan of mecha anime or anime in general, get this series!!!

It is so terrible the second half was not even English dubbed what more do you need to know? Its so bad i am ashamed to admit i bought it and i don't have it anymore either and i have never gotten rid of anything else.
